episodes.title: A Mom of Six's Escape from a YouTube-Fueled Cult
episodes.description: Coach Wade was eight months pregnant when her husband clicked on a YouTube video that changed everything. What started as faith-based “family leadership” content became a decade of control, financial manipulation, and spiritual abuse under Straightway Truth Ministries. India sits down with Coach Wade to unpack how Straightway Truth Ministries preys on athletes and ex-military men, (especially those searching for purpose, and guidance), and how they escaped. Topics: cults & community • hebrew israelites • religious trauma • motherhood • YouTube cultsFollow @ilybutpodcast on Instagram & TikTok for more. Guest → Coach Therna C. Wade @mrscoachwade | Email coachwade@wayaheadcoachings.com

episodes.title: How to Leave a Religious Cult: Jehovah’s Witness Escapee & Finding Yourself Again
episodes.description: India sits down with cult survivor turned life coach, AngieBe, to unpack what it’s really like to escape a high-control religion. From believing God caused 9/11 as a punishment to rebuilding intuition and community, this episode explores how faith can be turned to fear and control. Topics: Religious trauma • Control vs Community • Reconnecting with intuition Season 2 theme: Cults & CommunityFollow @ilybutpodcast on Instagram & TikTok for more.
